verses.text_plain: Then answered Zophar the Naamathite, and said,
verses.verse_html: 1Then answered Zophar the Naamathite, and said,

verses.text_plain: Should not the multitude of words be answered? and should a man full of talk be justified?
verses.verse_html:
2Should not the multitude of words be answered? and should a man full of talk be justified? ▼
▼ full…: Heb. of lips

footnotes.body_html: ▼ full…: Heb. of lips

verses.text_plain: Should thy lies make men hold their peace? and when thou mockest, shall no man make thee ashamed?
verses.verse_html:
3Should thy lies make men hold their peace? and when thou mockest, shall no man make thee ashamed? ▼
▼ lies: or, devices

tokens.text: shall no man make thee ashamed

verses.text_plain: For thou hast said, My doctrine is pure, and I am clean in thine eyes.
verses.verse_html: 4For thou hast said, My doctrine is pure, and I am clean in thine eyes.

verses.text_plain: But oh that God would speak, and open his lips against thee;
verses.verse_html: 5But oh that God would speak, and open his lips against thee;

verses.text_plain: And that he would shew thee the secrets of wisdom, that they are double to that which is! Know therefore that God exacteth of thee less than thine iniquity deserveth.
verses.verse_html: 6And that he would shew thee the secrets of wisdom, that they are double to that which is! Know therefore that God exacteth of thee less than thine iniquity deserveth.

verses.text_plain: Canst thou by searching find out God? canst thou find out the Almighty unto perfection?
verses.verse_html: 7Canst thou by searching find out God? canst thou find out the Almighty unto perfection?

verses.text_plain: It is as high as heaven; what canst thou do? deeper than hell; what canst thou know?
verses.verse_html:
8It is as high as heaven; what canst thou do? deeper than hell; what canst thou know? ▼
▼ as high…: Heb. the heights of heaven

footnotes.body_text: ▼ as high…: Heb. the heights of heaven
footnotes.body_html: ▼ as high…: Heb. the heights of heaven

verses.text_plain: The measure thereof is longer than the earth, and broader than the sea.
verses.verse_html: 9The measure thereof is longer than the earth, and broader than the sea.

verses.text_plain: If he cut off, and shut up, or gather together, then who can hinder him?
verses.verse_html:
10If he cut off, and shut up, or gather together, then who can hinder him? ▼
▼ cut…: or, make a change
 , ▼
▼ hinder…: Heb. turn him away?

footnotes.body_html: ▼ cut…: or, make a change
▼ hinder…: Heb. turn him away?

verses.text_plain: For he knoweth vain men: he seeth wickedness also; will he not then consider it?
verses.verse_html: 11For he knoweth vain men: he seeth wickedness also; will he not then consider it?

tokens.text: also; will he not then consider

verses.text_plain: For vain man would be wise, though man be born like a wild ass’s colt.
verses.verse_html:
12For vain man would be wise, though man be born like a wild ass’s colt. ▼
▼ vain: Heb. empty

verses.text_plain: If thou prepare thine heart, and stretch out thine hands toward him;
verses.verse_html: 13If thou prepare thine heart, and stretch out thine hands toward him;

verses.text_plain: If iniquity be in thine hand, put it far away, and let not wickedness dwell in thy tabernacles.
verses.verse_html: 14If iniquity be in thine hand, put it far away, and let not wickedness dwell in thy tabernacles.

verses.text_plain: For then shalt thou lift up thy face without spot; yea, thou shalt be stedfast, and shalt not fear:
verses.verse_html: 15For then shalt thou lift up thy face without spot; yea, thou shalt be stedfast, and shalt not fear:

tokens.text: For then shalt thou lift up

verses.text_plain: Because thou shalt forget thy misery, and remember it as waters that pass away:
verses.verse_html: 16Because thou shalt forget thy misery, and remember it as waters that pass away:

verses.text_plain: And thine age shall be clearer than the noonday; thou shalt shine forth, thou shalt be as the morning.
verses.verse_html:
17And thine age shall be clearer than the noonday; thou shalt shine forth, thou shalt be as the morning. ▼
▼ be clearer…: Heb. arise above

tokens.text: thou shalt be as the morning

footnotes.body_html: ▼ be clearer…: Heb. arise above

verses.text_plain: And thou shalt be secure, because there is hope; yea, thou shalt dig about thee, and thou shalt take thy rest in safety.
verses.verse_html: 18And thou shalt be secure, because there is hope; yea, thou shalt dig about thee, and thou shalt take thy rest in safety.

verses.text_plain: Also thou shalt lie down, and none shall make thee afraid; yea, many shall make suit unto thee.
verses.verse_html:
19Also thou shalt lie down, and none shall make thee afraid; yea, many shall make suit unto thee. ▼
▼ make suit…: Heb. intreat thy face

footnotes.body_text: ▼ make suit…: Heb. intreat thy face
footnotes.body_html: ▼ make suit…: Heb. intreat thy face

verses.text_plain: But the eyes of the wicked shall fail, and they shall not escape, and their hope shall be as the giving up of the ghost.
verses.verse_html:
20But the eyes of the wicked shall fail, and they shall not escape, and their hope shall be as the giving up of the ghost. ▼
▼ they shall…: Heb. flight shall perish from them
 , ▼
▼ the giving…: or, a puff of breath

footnotes.body_text: ▼ they shall…: Heb. flight shall perish from them
footnotes.body_html: ▼ they shall…: Heb. flight shall perish from them

footnotes.body_text: ▼ the giving…: or, a puff of breath
footnotes.body_html: ▼ the giving…: or, a puff of breath
